00058 typedef orxU32                      orxRGBA;
00059 
00060 #ifdef __orxBIG_ENDIAN__
00061 
00062   #define orx2RGBA(R, G, B, A)      ((((R) & 0xFF) << 24) | (((G) & 0xFF) << 16) | (((B) & 0xFF) << 8) | ((A) & 0xFF))
00063   #define orxRGBA_R(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 24) & 0xFF)
00064   #define orxRGBA_G(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 16) & 0xFF)
00065   #define orxRGBA_B(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 8) & 0xFF)
00066   #define orxRGBA_A(RGBA)           (orxU8)((RGBA) & 0xFF)
00067 
00068 #else /* __orxBIG_ENDIAN__ */
00069 
00070   #define orx2RGBA(R, G, B, A)      ((((A) & 0xFF) << 24) | (((B) & 0xFF) << 16) | (((G) & 0xFF) << 8) | ((R) & 0xFF))
00071   #define orxRGBA_R(RGBA)           (orxU8)((RGBA) & 0xFF)
00072   #define orxRGBA_G(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 8) & 0xFF)
00073   #define orxRGBA_B(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 16) & 0xFF)
00074   #define orxRGBA_A(RGBA)           (orxU8)(((RGBA) >> 24) & 0xFF)
00075 
00076 #endif /* __orxBIG_ENDIAN__ */
00077 
00078 #define orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER         (orx2F(1.0f / 255.0f))
00079 #define orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER       (orx2F(255.0f))

00265 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetRGBA(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, orxRGBA _stRGBA)
00266 {
00267   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00268 
00269   /* Checks */
00270   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00271 
00272   /* Stores RGB */
00273   orxVector_Set(&(_pstColor->vRGB), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_R(_stRGBA)), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_G(_stRGBA)), orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxU2F(orxRGBA_B(_stRGBA)));
00274 
00275   /* Stores alpha */
00276   _pstColor->fAlpha = orxCOLOR_NORMALIZER * orxRGBA_A(_stRGBA);
00277 
00278   /* Done! */
00279   return pstResult;
00280 }
00281 
00288 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_Set(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, const orxVECTOR *_pvRGB, orxFLOAT _fAlpha)
00289 {
00290   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00291 
00292   /* Checks */
00293   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00294 
00295   /* Stores RGB */
00296   orxVector_Copy(&(_pstColor->vRGB), _pvRGB);
00297 
00298   /* Stores alpha */
00299   _pstColor->fAlpha = _fAlpha;
00300 
00301   /* Done! */
00302   return pstResult;
00303 }
00304 
00310 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, const orxVECTOR *_pvRGB)
00311 {
00312   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00313 
00314   /* Checks */
00315   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00316   orxASSERT(_pvRGB != orxNULL);
00317 
00318   /* Stores components */
00319   orxVector_Copy(&(_pstColor->vRGB), _pvRGB);
00320 
00321   /* Done! */
00322   return pstResult;
00323 }

00330 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_SetAlpha(orxCOLOR *_pstColor, orxFLOAT _fAlpha)
00331 {
00332   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstColor;
00333 
00334   /* Checks */
00335   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00336 
00337   /* Stores it */
00338   _pstColor->fAlpha = _fAlpha;
00339 
00340   /* Done! */
00341   return pstResult;

00343 
00348 static orxINLINE orxRGBA          orxColor_ToRGBA(const orxCOLOR *_pstColor)
00349 {
00350   orxRGBA   stResult;
00351   orxVECTOR vColor;
00352   orxFLOAT  fAlpha;
00353 
00354   /* Checks */
00355   orxASSERT(_pstColor != orxNULL);
00356 
00357   /* Clamps RGB components */
00358   orxVector_Clamp(&vColor, &(_pstColor->vRGB), &orxVECTOR_0, &orxVECTOR_WHITE);
00359 
00360   /* De-normalizes vector */
00361   orxVector_Mulf(&vColor, &vColor, orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER);
00362 
00363   /* Clamps alpha */
00364   fAlpha = orxCLAMP(_pstColor->fAlpha, orxFLOAT_0, orxFLOAT_1);
00365 
00366   /* Updates result */
00367   stResult = orx2RGBA(orxF2U(vColor.fR), orxF2U(vColor.fG), orxF2U(vColor.fB), orxF2U(orxCOLOR_DENORMALIZER * fAlpha));
00368 
00369   /* Done! */
00370   return stResult;
00371 }
00372 
00378 static orxINLINE orxCOLOR *       orxColor_Copy(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00379 {
00380   /* Checks */
00381   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00382   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00383 
00384   /* Copies it */
00385   orxMemory_Copy(_pstDst, _pstSrc, sizeof(orxCOLOR));
00386 
00387   /* Done! */
00388   return _pstDst;
00389 }

00396 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromRGBToHSL(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00397 {
00398   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00399   orxFLOAT  fMin, fMax, fDelta, fR, fG, fB;
00400 
00401   /* Checks */
00402   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00403   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00404 
00405   /* Gets source red, blue and green components */
00406   fR = _pstSrc->vRGB.fR;
00407   fG = _pstSrc->vRGB.fG;
00408   fB = _pstSrc->vRGB.fB;
00409 
00410   /* Gets min, max & delta values */
00411   fMin    = orxMIN(fR, orxMIN(fG, fB));
00412   fMax    = orxMAX(fR, orxMAX(fG, fB));
00413   fDelta  = fMax - fMin;
00414 
00415   /* Stores lightness */
00416   pstResult->vHSL.fL = orx2F(0.5f) * (fMax + fMin);
00417 
00418   /* Gray? */
00419   if(fDelta == orxFLOAT_0)
00420   {
00421     /* Gets hue & saturation */
00422     pstResult->vHSL.fH = pstResult->vHSL.fS = orxFLOAT_0;
00423   }
00424   else
00425   {
00426     /* Updates saturation */
00427     pstResult->vHSL.fS = (pstResult->vHSL.fL < orx2F(0.5f))
00428                        ? fDelta / (fMax + fMin)
00429                        : fDelta / (orx2F(2.0f) - fMax - fMin);
00430 
00431     /* Red tone? */
00432     if(fR == fMax)
00433     {
00434       /* Updates hue */
00435       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fG - fB) / fDelta;
00436     }
00437     /* Green tone? */
00438     else if(fG == fMax)
00439     {
00440       /* Updates hue */
00441       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fB - fR) / fDelta);
00442     }
00443     /* Blue tone */
00444     else
00445     {
00446       /* Updates hue */
00447       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fR - fG) / fDelta);
00448     }
00449 
00450     /* Clamps hue */
00451     if(pstResult->vHSL.fH < orxFLOAT_0)
00452     {
00453       pstResult->vHSL.fH += orxFLOAT_1;
00454     }
00455     else if(pstResult->vHSL.fH > orxFLOAT_1)
00456     {
00457       pstResult->vHSL.fH -= orxFLOAT_1;
00458     }
00459   }
00460 
00461   /* Updates alpha */
00462   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00463 
00464   /* Done! */
00465   return pstResult;
00466 }
00467 
00473 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromHSLToRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00474 {
00475   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00476   orxFLOAT  fH, fS, fL;
00477 
00478 #define orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(RESULT, ALT, CHROMA, HUE)                      \
00479 do                                                                                \
00480 {                                                                                 \
00481   if(HUE < orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f))                                                    \
00482   {                                                                               \
00483     RESULT = ALT + (orx2F(6.0f) * HUE * (CHROMA - ALT));                          \
00484   }                                                                               \
00485   else if(HUE < orx2F(1.0f / 2.0f))                                               \
00486   {                                                                               \
00487     RESULT = CHROMA;                                                              \
00488   }                                                                               \
00489   else if(HUE < orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f))                                               \
00490   {                                                                               \
00491     RESULT = ALT + (orx2F(6.0f) * (CHROMA - ALT) * (orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) - HUE));   \
00492   }                                                                               \
00493   else                                                                            \
00494   {                                                                               \
00495     RESULT = ALT;                                                                 \
00496   }                                                                               \
00497   if(RESULT < orxMATH_KF_EPSILON)                                                 \
00498   {                                                                               \
00499     RESULT = orxFLOAT_0;                                                          \
00500   }                                                                               \
00501   else if(RESULT > orxFLOAT_1 - orxMATH_KF_EPSILON)                               \
00502   {                                                                               \
00503     RESULT = orxFLOAT_1;                                                          \
00504   }                                                                               \
00505 }                                                                                 \
00506 while(orxFALSE)
00507 
00508   /* Checks */
00509   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00510   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00511 
00512   /* Gets source hue, saturation and lightness components */
00513   fH = _pstSrc->vRGB.fH;
00514   fS = _pstSrc->vRGB.fS;
00515   fL = _pstSrc->vRGB.fL;
00516 
00517   /* Gray? */
00518   if(fS == orxFLOAT_0)
00519   {
00520     /* Updates result */
00521     orxVector_SetAll(&(pstResult->vRGB), fL);
00522   }
00523   else
00524   {
00525     orxFLOAT fChroma, fIntermediate;
00526 
00527     /* Gets chroma */
00528     fChroma = (fL < orx2F(0.5f))
00529             ? fL + (fL * fS)
00530             : fL + fS - (fL * fS);
00531 
00532     /* Gets intermediate value */
00533     fIntermediate = (orx2F(2.0f) * fL) - fChroma;
00534 
00535     /* Gets RGB components */
00536     if(fH > orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f))
00537     {
00538       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fR, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH - orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f)));
00539     }
00540     else
00541     {
00542       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fR, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH + orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f)));
00543     }
00544     orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fG, fIntermediate, fChroma, fH);
00545     if(fH < orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f))
00546     {
00547       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fB, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH + orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f)));
00548     }
00549     else
00550     {
00551       orxCOLOR_GET_RGB_COMPONENT(pstResult->vRGB.fB, fIntermediate, fChroma, (fH - orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f)));
00552     }
00553   }
00554 
00555   /* Updates alpha */
00556   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00557 
00558   /* Done! */
00559   return pstResult;
00560 }
00561 
00567 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromRGBToHSV(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00568 {
00569   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00570   orxFLOAT  fMin, fMax, fDelta, fR, fG, fB;
00571 
00572   /* Checks */
00573   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00574   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00575 
00576   /* Gets source red, blue and green components */
00577   fR = _pstSrc->vRGB.fR;
00578   fG = _pstSrc->vRGB.fG;
00579   fB = _pstSrc->vRGB.fB;
00580 
00581   /* Gets min, max & delta values */
00582   fMin    = orxMIN(fR, orxMIN(fG, fB));
00583   fMax    = orxMAX(fR, orxMAX(fG, fB));
00584   fDelta  = fMax - fMin;
00585 
00586   /* Stores value */
00587   pstResult->vHSL.fV = fMax;
00588 
00589   /* Gray? */
00590   if(fDelta == orxFLOAT_0)
00591   {
00592     /* Gets hue & saturation */
00593     pstResult->vHSL.fH = pstResult->vHSL.fS = orxFLOAT_0;
00594   }
00595   else
00596   {
00597     /* Updates saturation */
00598     pstResult->vHSL.fS = fDelta / fMax;
00599 
00600     /* Red tone? */
00601     if(fR == fMax)
00602     {
00603       /* Updates hue */
00604       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fG - fB) / fDelta;
00605     }
00606     /* Green tone? */
00607     else if(fG == fMax)
00608     {
00609       /* Updates hue */
00610       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(1.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fB - fR) / fDelta);
00611     }
00612     /* Blue tone */
00613     else
00614     {
00615       /* Updates hue */
00616       pstResult->vHSL.fH = orx2F(2.0f / 3.0f) + (orx2F(1.0f / 6.0f) * (fR - fG) / fDelta);
00617     }
00618 
00619     /* Clamps hue */
00620     if(pstResult->vHSL.fH < orxFLOAT_0)
00621     {
00622       pstResult->vHSL.fH += orxFLOAT_1;
00623     }
00624     else if(pstResult->vHSL.fH > orxFLOAT_1)
00625     {
00626       pstResult->vHSL.fH -= orxFLOAT_1;
00627     }
00628   }
00629 
00630   /* Updates alpha */
00631   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00632 
00633   /* Done! */
00634   return pstResult;
00635 }
00636 
00642 static orxCOLOR *orxFASTCALL      orxColor_FromHSVToRGB(orxCOLOR *_pstDst, const orxCOLOR *_pstSrc)
00643 {
00644   orxCOLOR *pstResult = _pstDst;
00645   orxFLOAT  fH, fS, fV;
00646 
00647   /* Checks */
00648   orxASSERT(_pstDst != orxNULL);
00649   orxASSERT(_pstSrc != orxNULL);
00650 
00651   /* Gets source hue, saturation and value components */
00652   fH = _pstSrc->vRGB.fH;
00653   fS = _pstSrc->vRGB.fS;
00654   fV = _pstSrc->vRGB.fV;
00655 
00656   /* Gray? */
00657   if(fS == orxFLOAT_0)
00658   {
00659     /* Updates result */
00660     orxVector_SetAll(&(pstResult->vRGB), fV);
00661   }
00662   else
00663   {
00664     orxFLOAT fFullHue, fSector, fIntermediate;
00665 
00666     /* Gets intermediate value */
00667     fIntermediate = fV * fS;
00668 
00669     /* Gets full hue & sector */
00670     fFullHue  = orx2F(6.0f) * fH;
00671     fSector   = orxMath_Floor(fFullHue);
00672 
00673     /* Depending on sector */
00674     switch(orxF2U(fSector))
00675     {
00676       default:
00677       case 0:
00678       {
00679         /* Updates RGB components */
00680         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV;
00681         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00682         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - fIntermediate;
00683 
00684         break;
00685       }
00686 
00687       case 1:
00688       {
00689         /* Updates RGB components */
00690         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00691         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV;
00692         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - fIntermediate;
00693 
00694         break;
00695       }
00696 
00697       case 2:
00698       {
00699         /* Updates RGB components */
00700         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - fIntermediate;
00701         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV;
00702         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00703 
00704         break;
00705       }
00706 
00707       case 3:
00708       {
00709         /* Updates RGB components */
00710         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - fIntermediate;
00711         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00712         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV;
00713 
00714         break;
00715       }
00716 
00717       case 4:
00718       {
00719         /* Updates RGB components */
00720         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV - (fIntermediate - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector)));
00721         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - fIntermediate;
00722         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV;
00723 
00724         break;
00725       }
00726 
00727       case 5:
00728       {
00729         /* Updates RGB components */
00730         pstResult->vRGB.fR = fV;
00731         pstResult->vRGB.fG = fV - fIntermediate;
00732         pstResult->vRGB.fB = fV - (fIntermediate * (fFullHue - fSector));
00733 
00734         break;
00735       }
00736     }
00737   }
00738 
00739   /* Updates alpha */
00740   pstResult->fAlpha = _pstSrc->fAlpha;
00741 
00742   /* Done! */
00743   return pstResult;
00744 }
